duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet customers upon arrival and perform initial check-in procedures.
Assist new customers with questions and state-required forms, updating customer information in the POS system.
Maintain and stock the waiting room and sales floor during down time.
Educate customers on cannabis properties and selection of proper genetics.
Fill online orders and greet/checkout curbside customers, ensuring compliance with state regulations.
Handle customer complaints professionally and escalate to management when needed.
Maintain product knowledge, keep up on current cannabis trends, and accurately use and maintain the POS system.
Comply with company cash handling policies, perform daily cash management responsibilities, and assist with product intake and inventory counts.
Ensure compliance with dispensary policies, local/state regulations, security protocols, inventory tracking, dress code, and work schedules.
Maintain compliance with local and state regulations, company policies, and SOPs.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or General Education Diploma (GED)
